The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all copies of the Software and its Copyright notices. In addition publicly documented acknowledgment must be given that this software has been used if no source code of this software is made available publicly. Making the source available publicly means including the source for this software with the distribution, or a method to get this software via some reasonable mechanism (electronic transfer via a network or media) as well as making an offer to supply the source on request. This Copyright notice serves as an offer to supply the source on on request as well. Instead of this, supplying acknowledgments of use of this software in either Copyright notices, Manuals, Publicity and Marketing documents or any documentation provided with any product containing this software. This License does not apply to any software that links to the libraries provided by this software (statically or dynamically), but only to the software provided.

contents.contents: A license is allowed if Fedora determines that the license is a free software / open source license. At a high level, the inquiry involves determining whether the license provides software freedom, and (equivalently) making sure that the license does not place burdens on users' exercise of its permissions that are inconsistent with evolving community norms and traditions around what is acceptable in a free software / open source license. See below for more on the history of Fedora licensing policy.

contents.contents: Eine Lizenz ist freigegeben, wenn sie nach fachlicher und juristischer Prüfung seitens Open CoDE sowohl der Open Source Definition (gemäß Definition der Open Source Initiative [extern]) entspricht und darüber hinaus keine für die Öffentliche Verwaltung erkennbaren Schwierigkeiten birgt. Außer in Ausnahmefällen ist nicht zu erwarten, dass einmal freigegebene Lizenzen deklassifiziert werden.

permissions._str:
Description: Relevant documentation for the software should be treated in the same way as for the software.
Actions:
- Ol Use the obtained source code without modification (Use the fetched code as it is.)
- Ol Modify the obtained source code.
- Ol Using Modified Source Code
- Ol Use the retrieved object code (Use the fetched code as it is.)
- Ol Use the object code generated from the modified source code
- Ol Use the retrieved executable (Use the obtained executable as is.)
- Ol Use the executable generated from the modified source code

Conditions: None

contents.description: Use the fetched code as it is.
contents.name: Use the obtained source code without modification

contents.description: Use the fetched code as it is.
contents.name: Use the retrieved object code
Use the object code generated from the modified source code

contents.description: Use the obtained executable as is.
contents.name: Use the retrieved executable
Use the executable generated from the modified source code

permissions.description: Relevant documentation for the software should be treated in the same way as for the software.

permissions._str:
Description: The relevant documentation for the software will be treated in the same way as the software. The same rights will be granted to those to whom the software is provided.
Actions:
- Ol Distribute the obtained source code without modification (Redistribute the code as it was obtained)
- Ol Distribution of Modified Source Code
- Ol Sublicense the acquired source code. (Sublicensing means that the person to whom the license was granted re-grants the license granted to a third party.)
- Ol Sublicensing Modified Source Code (Sublicensing means that the person to whom the license was granted re-grants the license granted to a third party.)
- Ol Publish the modified source code.
- Ol Publish the acquired source code. (Publish the source code as it was obtained.)

Conditions:
AND
  Ol OBLIGATION: Include copyright notice, trademark notice, list of terms and conditions, and disclaimer included in the license

contents.description: Redistribute the code as it was obtained
contents.name: Distribute the obtained source code without modification

contents.description: Sublicensing means that the person to whom the license was granted re-grants the license granted to a third party.
contents.name: Sublicense the acquired source code.

contents.description: Publish the source code as it was obtained.
contents.name: Publish the acquired source code.
Include copyright notice, trademark notice, list of terms and conditions, and disclaimer included in the license

permissions.description: The relevant documentation for the software will be treated in the same way as the software. The same rights will be granted to those to whom the software is provided.

permissions._str:
Description: The relevant documentation for the software will be treated in the same way as the software. The same rights will be granted to those to whom the software is provided. Acknowledgements should be included in any copyright notices, manuals, advertising or promotional documents, or accompanying documentation for products containing the software. The acknowledgment should state that the software is being used.
Actions:
- Ol Distribute the obtained object code (Redistribute the code as it was obtained)
- Ol Distribute the object code generated from the modified source code
- Ol Sublicense the acquired object code (Sublicensing means that the person to whom the license was granted re-grants the license granted to a third party.)
- Ol Sublicense the object code generated from the modified source code (Sublicensing means that the person to whom the license was granted re-grants the license granted to a third party.)
- Ol Selling Software
- Ol Distribute the obtained executable (Redistribute the obtained executable as-is)
- Ol Distribute the executable generated from the modified source code
- Ol Present the object code generated from the modified source code.
- Ol Present the executable generated from the modified source code
- Ol Sublicense the acquired executable (Sublicensing means that the person to whom the license was granted re-grants the license granted to a third party.)
- Ol Sublicense the generated executable from modified source code (Sublicensing means that the person to whom the license was granted re-grants the license granted to a third party.)
- Ol Publish the retrieved object code (Publish the fetched object code as it is.)
- Ol Present the obtained executables. (Publish the obtained executable as is.)

Conditions:
AND
  Ol OBLIGATION: Include copyright notice, trademark notice, list of terms and conditions, and disclaimer included in the license
  OR
    Ol OBLIGATION: Acknowledgements
    OR
      Ol OBLIGATION: Attach the source code corresponding to the software in question.
      Ol OBLIGATION: Communicate that the corresponding source code for the software is available on media commonly used for software interchange and in a reasonable manner.
      Ol OBLIGATION: Provide source code for the software upon request
